name: Mach V Harold
description:
Harold struggles with the tragic loss of his mother and the ensuing disillusionment about everything she has taught him.  Yet not everything is as it seems, and Harold soon discovers a secret about himself that will make him question everything he's ever known.

Meanwhile, following the events of Haroldmancer, Ultimate Therese, Ultimate Marsha, and Ultimate Lucius search for a replacement for the tragically departed Ultimate Harold. Will this new Harold be the end of their long search?

Submission to the Enter the Haroldverse game jam, August 2021.

Cover Image: Harold by Robert Pinero/Low/Lowfox Studio

Themes: 
(Secret Primary Theme)
MV
